statements: SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM game_inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM game_inventory GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY date_added DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT id, player_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_id, player_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 2 AND quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 3 AND date_added > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, player_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT distribution_date, quantity FROM item_distribution WHERE distribution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY player_id ASC
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM game_inventory GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 1001 AND quantity >= 5
SELECT item_id, distribution_date, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM item_distribution GROUP BY item_id, distribution_date HAVING total_quantity > 20
SELECT * FROM item_distribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY distribution_date DESC
SELECT * FROM game_inventory;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM game_players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE game_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, last_login FROM game_players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_playtime, total_items_collected FROM game_statistics WHERE total_playtime > 1000 AND total_items_collected > 50 ORDER BY total_playtime DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM game_players WHERE player_level > 50 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_playtime, total_gold_earned FROM game_players p JOIN game_statistics s ON p.player_id = s.player_id WHERE s.total_playtime > 1000 ORDER BY total_playtime DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items_collected FROM game_players p JOIN game_statistics s ON p.player_id = s.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY total_items_collected ASC;

SELECT player_id, player_name, total_playtime, total_items_collected, total_gold_earned FROM game_players p JOIN game_statistics s ON p.player_id = s.player_id JOIN game_inventory i ON p.player_id = i.player_id WHERE item_name IN ('Sword', 'Shield') ORDER BY total_gold_earned DESC, total_playtime DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN inventory ON players.player_id = inventory.player_id JOIN items ON items.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT player_name, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT items.item_name, inventory.quantity FROM items INNER JOIN inventory ON items.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT players.player_name, items.item_name, transactions.quantity FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id JOIN items ON transactions.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM players JOIN inventory ON players.player_id = inventory.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 10;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM items ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, game_currency FROM players WHERE player_level < 10 ORDER BY game_currency DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 50 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM items WHERE item_quantity < 10 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE players.player_level >= 30 AND item_name LIKE 'Sword%';
SELECT player_name, item_name, transaction_date FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT player_name, item_name, price FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id JOIN item_prices ON transactions.item_id = item_prices.item_id WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
